software.name: Alien Front
software.Description: Alien Front is an Action game, developed by Sega and published by Nokia, which was cancelled before it was released.

software.name: Aquababe
software.Description: Aquababe is an Action game, developed and published by Living Mobile, which was cancelled before it was released.

software.name: Ashen
software.Description:
Ashen is a 3D 1st Person Shooter made exclusively for the Nokia N-Gage Game Deck.
Featuring: - Fast paced action set within gothic and alien cityscapes. - 9 unique and intelligently behaving enemy types. - 9 weapon types from dual handguns to rocket launchers and alien pulse guns. - 'Ghost Vision' viewing mode to detect invisible enemies. - 8 single player levels. - Dedicated multiplayer maps for up to 4 players in Deathmatch and Team Deathmatch game modes.

software.name: Asphalt: Urban GT
software.Description: Asphalt Urban GT combines the virtues of both simulation and arcade racing for the Nintendo DS. You'll hit the streets in a variety of licensed high-performance cars on tracks all over the world. Winning races, collecting prize money, and then purchasing new cars and modifying current ones are keys to success. The game also features three different multiplayer modes that let you race against three other players.

software.name: Asphalt: Urban GT 2
software.Description: Asphalt: Urban GT 2 shifts into gear with six game modes, numerous tuning possibilities, 30 tracks and 36 licensed cars and motorcycles - taking handheld racing simulations to a new level. To keep the action hot, Asphalt: Urban GT 2 features music from Moby and music and appearances from the Pussycat Dolls.

software.name: Atari Masterpieces Vol. I
software.Description: Atari Masterpieces Vol. I is a Miscellaneous game, developed by Backbone Entertainment and published by Atari, which was released in 2005.

software.name: Atari Masterpieces Vol. II
software.Description: Atari Masterpieces Vol. II is a Miscellaneous game, developed by Backbone Entertainment and published by Atari, which was released in 2006.

software.name: Bomberman
software.Description: Bomberman arrives on the DS with a variety of gameplay modes, touch screen functionality, and voice support. Using only one game card, you and seven of your friends can lay bombs in different arenas rife with power-ups. In single-player mode, you can test your reflexes and strategies through 100 stages of challenging puzzles.

software.name: Bounce Boing Voyage
software.Description: Bounce Boing Voyage is an Action game, developed by Rovio Mobile and published by Nokia, which was released in 2008.

software.name: Call of Duty
software.Description: Call of Duty delivers the gritty realism and cinematic intensity of World War II's epic battlefield moments through the eyes of citizen soldiers and unsung heroes from an alliance of countries who, together, helped shape the course of modern history. Play through the chaos of battle as part of a well-trained squad that lays down covering fire and pulls its wounded to safety. In addition to authentic squad movements and tactics, each soldier's distinct personality and training comes out on the battlefield. From the perspectives of American, British, and Russian soldiers, take on mission objectives ranging from sabotage and all-out assault to stealth, vehicle combat, and rescue. Authentic weapons, locations, vehicles, and sounds of war immerse you in an intense World War II experience.

software.name: Catan
software.Description:
Catan, based on the best-selling board game "Settlers of Catan," places you in the role of a colonist on a newly discovered imaginary island. Through strategy and trading, vie for control with other players over the territory and resources of this uncharted wilderness.
Compete online with your friends from around the world, or go up against a computer personality. Features include an all-new 3-D "Living World" environment and robust computer gameplay to challenge all skill levels--even the experts!
Catan is addictive fun for all ages, taking just minutes to learn and a lifetime to master!

software.name: Civilization
software.Description: Civilization is a Strategy game, developed by Gryphondale Studios and published by Atari, which was released in 2006.

software.name: Colin McRae Rally 2005
software.Description: Colin McRae Rally 2005 offers more than 300 stages, enhanced vehicles, and the chance to race against the very best in rally racing. At the heart of the game is the all-new Career Challenge, which takes you through a full professional rally career as you drive a diverse selection of rally cars. Through the game's 23 events, you can drive cars including 4-wheel drive, 2-wheel drive, 4-wheel Classics, Super 2-wheel, Rear Wheel, Distinctive and 4x4 classics. Each rally event provides different challenges through a series of Cups, SuperCups, Shields, and Championships.

software.name: Crash Nitro Kart
software.Description: Crash hits the track in his fastest adventure yet--Crash Nitro Kart. Kidnapped by the ruthless Emperor Velo and forced to race in his galactic coliseum, Crash must race his way to victory in order to save the Earth from destruction--but it won't be easy, as he must compete against foes both old and new before a final showdown with Velo himself. Crash Nitro Kart mixes 18 rollercoaster raceways, devastating weapons, a variety of single and multiplayer modes and maps, and customizable arenas, and a cast of unique characters into a game that showcases kart-racing at its best.

software.name: DRIV3R
software.Description: The Wheelman returns in his most dangerous adventure yet--an interactive driving epic on par with the most intense Hollywood action blockbusters. Undertake a wide variety of high-speed vehicle-based missions and go deeper undercover than ever before. The game features over 70 playable vehicles, including cars, bikes, artics, and busses, and eight different weapons, ranging from handguns and machine guns to grenade launchers. Driver 3 provides gamers with all new gameplay possibilities, replayability, and a whole new driving experience.

software.name: Elder Scrolls Travels: Shadowkey, The
software.Description:
Experience role-playing action at its best in this latest epic from the award-winning Elder Scrolls series. Combat, magic and thief skills will help you survive and uncover the mysteries of the Shadowkey.
Co-op multiplayer via Bluetooth wireless technology. Battle 65 different monsters Explore 18 different levels

software.name: FIFA Football 2004
software.Description: FIFA Soccer kicks its game up a few notches with new installment, FIFA Soccer 2004. This year's action features more advanced levels of player detail and responsiveness. Play as one of the best players from 16 leagues and 350 teams, from Europe's super leagues to the Americas. Plus, a new Career Mode gives you the chance to take a team from the lower divisions, battle through ranks, sign new players, and turn them into champions. With immersive atmospheres, total realism with the world's premier clubs, and improved gameplay, FIFA Soccer 2004 looks to reach the goals of soccer fans.

software.name: FIFA Football 2005
software.Description: FIFA Soccer 2005 gives you more control than ever with improved button and control sensitivity and an intuitive Off the Ball Control. Now you can take command of players not in possession of the ball by calling in tackles, jostling for space, and sending your teammates on runs as you control the pitch. With more than 350 official team and league licenses from around the world, an enhanced Career mode, and an improved broadcast, FIFA Soccer 2005 gives you a complete and authentic soccer experience.

software.name: FIFA Soccer 2004
software.Description: FIFA Soccer kicks its game up a few notches with new installment, FIFA Soccer 2004. This year's action features more advanced levels of player detail and responsiveness. Play as one of the best players from 16 leagues and 350 teams, from Europe's super leagues to the Americas. Plus, a new Career Mode gives you the chance to take a team from the lower divisions, battle through ranks, sign new players, and turn them into champions. With immersive atmospheres, total realism with the world's premier clubs, and improved gameplay, FIFA Soccer 2004 looks to reach the goals of soccer fans.

software.name: FIFA Soccer 2005
software.Description: FIFA Soccer 2005 gives you more control than ever with improved button and control sensitivity and an intuitive Off the Ball Control. Now you can take command of players not in possession of the ball by calling in tackles, jostling for space, and sending your teammates on runs as you control the pitch. With more than 350 official team and league licenses from around the world, an enhanced Career mode, and an improved broadcast, FIFA Soccer 2005 gives you a complete and authentic soccer experience.

software.name: Flo Boarding
software.Description: Flo Boarding is a Sports game, developed by Housemarque and published by Nokia, which was released in Europe in 2003.

software.name: Glimmerati
software.Description: Glimmerati is a Racing game, developed by Bugbear and published by Nokia, which was released in Europe in 2005.

software.name: High Seize
software.Description: High Seize is a Strategy game, developed by RedLynx and published by Nokia, which was released in Europe in 2005.

software.name: Hinter Wars
software.Description: Hinter Wars is a Role-Playing game, developed by Activate and published by Nokia, which was cancelled before it was released.

software.name: King of Fighters Extreme, The
software.Description:
KOF is back...and the battle has begun! Master special moves to finish off your opponent!!
Over 20 characters make their appearance! Battle anyone at any time using Bluetooth wireless technology!

software.name: Leisure Suit Larry: Pocket Party
software.Description: Leisure Suit Larry: Pocket Party is an Adventure game, developed by TKO Software and published by VU Games, which was cancelled before it was released.

software.name: Marcel Desailly Pro Soccer
software.Description:
PIT YOURSELF AGAINST THE BEST TEAMS IN THE WORLD!
- 5 different modes - The crazy atmosphere of international soccer game faithfully reproduced - A huge up-to-date player database - Challenge your friends in 2-player versus matches

software.name: Mile High Pinball
software.Description: Mile High Pinball is an Action game, developed by Bonus Mobile Entertainment and published by Nokia, which was released in Europe in 2005.

software.name: MLB Slam!
software.Description: Manage your own big league team by selecting starting lineups that include pinch hitters and relief pitchers from rosters of real professional players of MLB! Following official MLB rules, you can steal bases, take an extra base on a hit or call out substitutions. Use strategy at bat like a bunt to get on base or advance runners for the win. Pitch like the best and throw a curve ball over the plate for that last strikeout. MLB Slam! is sure to meet all baseball fans demand for true arcade fun. rn

software.name: MotoGP
software.Description: MotoGP puts you behind the handlebars of some of the fastest machines on two wheels. Take control of any of the bikes and riders from the world of Grand Prix Motorcycle racing, and race across 10 real-world tracks in a variety of game modes. In Grand Prix and Training modes, you can develop your own rider's attributes and then race to unlock tracks, riders, cheats, and bikes. Show off your speed and style in single-player tournaments or multiplayer races.

software.name: N-Gage
software.Description:
The Next Level of Gaming Play the hottest games from today's top game publishers (sold separately).
Optimized Game Controls The N-Gage game deck has an eight directional control pad and highlighted game action keys.
Digital Music Player Listen to digital music (MP3/AAc) or the FM Radio with stereo headset. Store your own music directly to a Multi Media Card (MMC not included).
International Phone Phone works in countries/areas with compatible GSM 900/1800/1900 networks, subject to roaming services provided/arranged by your mobile provider.
Single Player - Challenge yourself virtually anytime, anywhere! Multi-Player - Play against other N-Gage device owners using high-speed cellular networks or Bluetooth technology. Bluetooth - Play games with other N-Gage game deck owners wirelessly within 30 feet. Online Option - Enhance your games with wireless uploading and downloading of game content.
software.AKA: N-Gage Hardware (US, EU), N-Gage QD Hardware (EU, US)

software.name: N-Gage Hardware
software.Description:
The Next Level of Gaming Play the hottest games from today's top game publishers (sold separately).
Optimized Game Controls The N-Gage game deck has an eight directional control pad and highlighted game action keys.
Digital Music Player Listen to digital music (MP3/AAc) or the FM Radio with stereo headset. Store your own music directly to a Multi Media Card (MMC not included).
International Phone Phone works in countries/areas with compatible GSM 900/1800/1900 networks, subject to roaming services provided/arranged by your mobile provider.
Single Player - Challenge yourself virtually anytime, anywhere! Multi-Player - Play against other N-Gage device owners using high-speed cellular networks or Bluetooth technology. Bluetooth - Play games with other N-Gage game deck owners wirelessly within 30 feet. Online Option - Enhance your games with wireless uploading and downloading of game content.
software.AKA: N-Gage Hardware (US, EU), N-Gage QD Hardware (EU, US)

software.name: N-Gage QD Hardware
software.Description:
The Next Level of Gaming Play the hottest games from today's top game publishers (sold separately).
Optimized Game Controls The N-Gage game deck has an eight directional control pad and highlighted game action keys.
Digital Music Player Listen to digital music (MP3/AAc) or the FM Radio with stereo headset. Store your own music directly to a Multi Media Card (MMC not included).
International Phone Phone works in countries/areas with compatible GSM 900/1800/1900 networks, subject to roaming services provided/arranged by your mobile provider.
Single Player - Challenge yourself virtually anytime, anywhere! Multi-Player - Play against other N-Gage device owners using high-speed cellular networks or Bluetooth technology. Bluetooth - Play games with other N-Gage game deck owners wirelessly within 30 feet. Online Option - Enhance your games with wireless uploading and downloading of game content.
software.AKA: N-Gage Hardware (US, EU), N-Gage QD Hardware (EU, US)

software.name: NCAA Football 2004
software.Description: Experience the spirit, atmosphere, and emotion of college football like NCAA Football 2004. Whether you play as the one of the 36 new 1-AA teams or 20 classic teams from the last two decades, the game lets you celebrate the history of college football. Feel the tradition of college football Saturdays with all-new pre-game introductions and experience the pageantry with new mascots, flag-waving cheerleaders, and cannons. Other key features this season include improved college gameplay, EA Sports Online competition for the PlayStation 2, deeper Dynasty mode, and over 15 new teams and the all-new EA Sports Bio.

software.name: One
software.Description:
On top of the Global Ranking List there is room for only one. ONE-the revolutionary fighting game - provides mobile fighters around the globe with a possibility to change the world order.
Enjoy the breathtaking, full 3D graphics of 14 real locations from around the globe. Create and customize your fighter, fight using hundreds of motion-captured Jeet Kune Do moves, use combos and capture your opponents' secret moves. Do you have what it takes to become a legend - become The One?

software.name: Operation Shadow
software.Description:
In a world characterized by warring factions, greedy mercenaries and dwindling global resources, political leaders have their work cut out for them. But sometimes it takes more than a handshake to bring pece to troubled times.
When conflict on the Ixan border reaches crisis point, they know who to call... Jay Solano! This one man army will enforce peace by any means necessary!

software.name: Pandemonium!
software.Description: The fastest 3D character action game! Moving 3D comera showcases the huge, highly detailed 3D worlds.

software.name: Pathway to Glory
software.Description:
MOBILE COMMUNITY WARFARE
World War II explodes to life in the critically acclaimed Pathway to Glory, the most anticipated game exclusive to the N-Gage game deck. Lead entire platoons on intense, historically detailed combat missions. N-Gage Arena online gaming puts you in direct, real-time competition with other gamers from all over the world!

software.name: Pathway to Glory: Ikusa Islands
software.Description:
MOBILE COMMUNITY WARFARE
In this highly anticipated sequel, Pathway to Glory Ikusa Islands brings to life the Pacific Theater of the Second World War. Based on real events and many of the War's most fearsome battles. Path to Glory Ikusa Islands is a historically accurate combat experience in gaming. N-Gage Arena online gaming connects you with - and sometimes against - other players from all over the world!
- 10 unique single-player missions with 3 difficulty levels from Normal to Impossible - 9 intensive multiplayer missions in 3 different campaigns - Local Battleground via Bluetooth wireless technology for Hot Seat - for up to 6 players - Global Battleground via N-Gage Arena - GPRS online gaming

software.name: Payload
software.Description: Payload is a Simulation game, developed by Tantalus Interactive and published by Nokia, which was released in 2005.

software.name: Pocket Kingdom: Own the World
software.Description:
The World's 1st Global Massively Multiplayer Online Mobile Game
- Battle and chat online with gamers around the world - from anywhere in YOUR world! - 100 Collectable Units - Build armies of Ninjas, Wizards, Orcs, Dragons, Vampires and more! - Upgrade your armies with over 50,000 weapons, mystical magic items and precious gems!

software.name: Puyo Pop
software.Description: What exactly are puyos? Aside from being cute gobs of goo, they are the stars of the addictive game Puyo Pop from Sega. The classic blob-dropping puzzler is back, now on the hottest new gaming platform - the Nokia N-Gage game deck. It's raining puyos, and your job is to line up each one with its matching color. Link four or more of the same puyos together, and watch them disappear as your score increases. Go for big-scoring chains and combos, and foil your opponent's grouping strategies by dropping nasty Ojama puyos onto his pile. Four frenetic gameplay modes will challenge even the most talented puzzle champ.

software.name: Puzzle Bobble VS
software.Description:
We are excited to deliver Puzzle Bobble VS to the N-Gage game deck. Ready, aim and fire away as your try to keep the bubbles from filling up the screen.
Use bank shots to get those hard to reach places. Match three in a row to stay in the game.
Play against the game or another play over Bluetooth link.

software.name: Rayman 3
software.Description: Rayman 3, this year's smash game, makes its mobile phone debut in style. Explore strange new worlds, while using your reflexes to fight off enemies and win...

software.name: Red Faction
software.Description: A revolution has begun on Mars, and you are at the forefront. As part of a rebellious organization known as Red Faction, you must battle through 20 levels that feature deep seas, natural caves, Ultor Corporation's bases, and more. Hijack five land, sea, and air vehicles--each equipped with weapons--including an ATV, a submarine, and a high-flying fighter. Help yourself to 15 weapons of mass destruction, such as railguns, rocket launchers, riot sticks, and heavy explosives. Stealth, cooperation, and action are all important to achieve success.

software.name: Requiem of Hell
software.Description: Requiem of Hell is a Role-Playing game, developed by Digital-Red and published by Nokia, which was released in 2004.

software.name: Rifts: Promise of Power
software.Description:
MAGIC AND TECHNOLOGY COLLIDE IN A POST-APOCALYPTIC ADVENTURE!
Experience a new era in Tactical Role Playing in this first ever Rifts video game.
- 12+ characters classes, 50+ enemies and 100+ weapons, spells and psionics - Challenge up to 3 friends via Blueteooth wireless technology and N-Gage Arena

software.name: Roots: Gates of Chaos, The
software.Description: The Roots: Gates of Chaos is a Role-Playing game, developed and published by Cenega Publishing, which was released in Europe in 2005.

software.name: Sega Rally Championship
software.Description: It takes a driver with nerves of steel to take a high-powered racecar on the open road. Brave snowdrifts on ice-covered mountains, catch air off huge sand dunes in the desert, or careen around corners in the European countryside. Intensify the action by linking with 3 friends and going head-to-head in a 4-player race to the finish.

software.name: Shade: Wrath of Angels
software.Description: Adventure, mystery, and horror await you in your quest to unravel the mystery surrounding your brother's disappearance. With a strange letter and a key-shaped item as your only clues, you'll begin your journey across four alternative worlds--the present day, the Middle Ages, ancient Egypt, and The Shadow Land. As you solve puzzles and battle demons, angels, zombies, and other creatures, remember that nothing is what it seems. Keep focused on your goal of collecting torn souls at the end of each world experience.

software.name: Shadow-Born
software.Description: Shadow-Born is an Action Adventure game, developed by Backbone Entertainment and published by Nokia, which was cancelled before it was released.

software.name: Sims Bustin' Out, The
software.Description: The Sims are making a big return to the console and this time they are bustin' out of the house and exploring all-new locations around town. In The Sims Bustin' Out, players can choose from a variety of new career paths. Along the way, players can unlock and collect over a hundred of new objects and social moves exclusive to the console. Play, work, and socialize with a cast of over 25 new outrageous characters and climb through a dozen new careers. The Sims Bustin' Out also features new integrated two-player gameplay and memory card support, for those players who like to take their Sims over to a friend's house and show them off.

software.name: Snakes
software.Description: Snakes is a Puzzle game, developed by Iomo and published by Nokia, which was released in 2005.

software.name: SonicN
software.Description: Sonic is back to save the world! The evil Dr. Eggman is at it again, with a brand new scheme to trip up Sonic and his pals. Maneuver your way through obstacles, puzzles and traps to collect the chaos emeralds and defeat the vile Dr. Eggman before it's too late!

software.name: Spider-Man 2
software.Description:
TAKE NEW YORK FOR A SPIN From random crime to global threat, the entire city of New York is relying on you to save it.
- Race through 5 fully 3D web swinging environments - Combat a variety of enemies in 15 challenging 2D levels - Post your high scores through N-Gage Arena - An all new immersive plotline featuring 3D cut-scenes between levels

software.name: Spirits
software.Description: Spirits is a Role-Playing game, developed and published by Jadestone, which was cancelled before it was released.

software.name: SSX Out of Bounds
software.Description:
GET STOKED FOR EXTREME SHREDDIN'
- Carve down sick runs, catch big air and grind crazy rails. - Pull off dope tricks and the maddest flips. - Make fools of buddies in "friendly" competition via Bluetooth wireless technology. - Shadow race head-to-head through N-Gage Arena.

software.name: Super Monkey Ball
software.Description: Call your friends and warn your neighbors, it's time to have a ball! Go bananas with 90+ stages, multi-player madness, and 7 cool ways to play! Equal parts "party" and "game", Super Monkey Ball could be the most "well-rounded" game you've ever played!

software.name: System Rush
software.Description: Race to Win Infect the Network Bring Down Evil Corporations Hack into corrupt computer networks for extreme racing adventure! - Pilot your Co-Vec (code vehicle) through computer circuits in over 50 action-packed races. - Take on 3 Shadow Racers simultaneously via N-Gage Arena. - Choose from 10 customizable vehicles in this story-driven extravaganza! - Battle 15 Gang Bosses to become Kingpin of the networks.

software.name: Taito Memories
software.Description: Taito Memories is a Miscellaneous game, developed and published by Taito Corporation, which was cancelled before it was released.

software.name: Tiger Woods PGA Tour 2004
software.Description: While professional golfer Tiger Woods has no equal on the PGA Tour, you now have the chance to build a golfer that's even better. Take your custom golfer through the trials and tribulations of all the courses in Tiger Woods PGA Tour 2004, earning cash to spend on new digs and advanced equipment. Use the analog stick to shape any shot type such as the flop or punch. Go head-to-head against the computer, a friend, or an online player with PS2's network adapter. With all the top competition on some of the most famous fairways and greens ever, this is the one of the most complete golf experiences yet.

software.name: Tom Clancy's Ghost Recon
software.Description: When new leaders in Russia attempt to rebuild the Iron Curtain, war escalates, casualties mount, hostages are taken, and the Ghosts are sent in. Take a highly skilled Ghost team through a series of missions that range from demolitions to search-and-rescue and all-out firefights for survival. You can carry dozens of standard and special-issue weapons such as the M16A2, the M4 carbine, and the fearsome and deadly OICW. Bring a friend into the firefight in split-screen multiplayer mode. Your team--and the world--is counting on you.

software.name: Tom Clancy's Ghost Recon: Jungle Storm
software.Description: Castro is dead and a Colombian cartel-backed candidate pursues an all-out revolution. In Tom Clancy's Ghost Recon: Jungle Storm, you lead a group of highly skilled soldiers called Ghosts into Colombia to force the drug-fended mercenaries to retreat. Experience the 16 intense missions in single player or join battles online, going head-to-head with players from around the world. When equipped with the USB headset, you can issue dozens of voice commands to your teammates. It's time to show what you're made of on the battlefield.

Release.name: Tom Clancy's Ghost Recon: Jungle Storm

ReleaseImages.Image: Tom Clancy's Ghost Recon Jungle Storm (US)-57123_front.jpg

Release.name: Tom Clancy's Ghost Recon: Jungle Storm

ReleaseImages.Image: Tom Clancy's Ghost Recon Jungle Storm (EU)-57124_front.jpg

software.name: Tom Clancy's Splinter Cell Team Stealth Action
software.Description: Infiltrate terrorists' positions, acquire critical intelligence by any means necessary, execute with extreme prejudice, and exit without a trace. In Tom Clancy's Splinter Cell, you are Sam Fisher, a highly trained secret operative of the NSA's secret arm: Third Echelon. Suit up with the latest classified field operative gear and weapons as you travel through diverse mission objectives. The world's future is in your hands, as cyber terrorism and international tensions are about to explode into WWIII.

Release.name: Tom Clancy's Splinter Cell Team Stealth Action

ReleaseImages.Image: Tom Clancy's Splinter Cell Team Stealth Action (EU)-17363_front.jpg

Release.name: Tom Clancy's Splinter Cell Team Stealth Action

ReleaseImages.Image: Tom Clancy's Splinter Cell Team Stealth Action (US)-17362_front.jpg

software.name: Tom Clancy's Splinter Cell: Chaos Theory
software.Description: As Sam Fisher, Third Echelon's most skilled Splinter Cell operative, you are assigned to execute a hazardous series of operations to investigate and eliminate a new source of information attacks originating in North Korea. At your disposal is a lethal array of tactics ranging from Combat Knife techniques to experimental prototype weapons skills and more-radical hand-to-hand techniques such as the Inverted Chokehold. Experience the intensity of acting as a lone operative fighting tomorrow's threats in the field and of cooperating online with a partner to accomplish crucial missions.

Release.name: Tom Clancy's Splinter Cell: Chaos Theory

ReleaseImages.Image: Tom Clancy's Splinter Cell Chaos Theory (US)-60394_front.jpg

Release.name: Tom Clancy's Splinter Cell: Chaos Theory

ReleaseImages.Image: Tom Clancy's Splinter Cell Chaos Theory (EU)-60393_front.jpg

software.name: Tomb Raider
software.Description: Help Lara Croft explore the globe in her quest to find the mysterious artifact known as the Scion. This version of Tomb Raider includes online wireless services such as Directors cut, Fastest Finish and Strategy Guide to take game play to the next level.

software.name: Tony Hawk's Pro Skater
software.Description: The all-conquering skateboarding game comes to the Nokia N-Gage game deck, featuring a specially tuned version of the legendary control system, levels taken from three different versions of the game and Bluetoothmultiplayer capabilities.

software.name: Virtua Cop
software.Description: You're a cop. Putting your life on the line is your job. Staying alive is your challenge. Split second decision making, timing and lightning fast reflexes are what it takes in this adrenaline pumping game of cat and mouse. Dirt bags pop out of virtually every hiding place with their guns aimed, cocked and ready to shoot - you!

software.name: Virtua Tennis
software.Description: Imagine how a tennis player feels when he enters the arena, the crowd is cheering, the atmosphere electric, the adrenaline rushes... Well now you can with Virtua Tennis, the most lifelike and playable tennis game ever! Play as one of eight licensed players and uncover the secret stars. As well as the traditional arcade mode you can play in the exhibition mode, with 4 player action via doubles play. Once you're mastered these modes take on the world in the world circuit mode, with unique training games, different challenges and shops to buy clothing, equipment, stages and playing partners. Virtua Tennis - so realisitc you can almost taste the strawberries and cream.

software.name: Virtually Board Snowboarding II
software.Description: Virtually Board Snowboarding II is a Sports game, developed by Fathammer and published by Nokia, which was cancelled before it was released.

software.name: Warhammer 40,000: Glory in Death
software.Description: Warhammer 40,000: Glory in Death is a Strategy game, developed by Razorback Developments and published by Nokia, which was released in Europe in 2006.

software.name: Worms World Party
software.Description: Those wacky Worms are back and packing serious heat in this strategy game of mass destruction! Get four friends, lay out your battle map, and blast away with over 50 zany weapons like Homing Missiles, Super Banana Bombs and Nuclear Strikes. It's a brutal battle to decide who's the life of the Worms World Party!

software.name: WWE Aftershock
software.Description:
Bring the Pain!
Grapple with 12 WWE Superstars including Undertaker, Edge, Eddie Guerrero and Chris Benoit!
- Hear the crowd roar as Triple H applies the Pedigree. - Enrage on N-Gage game deck. Beat down friends with Bluetooth wireless gameplay. - 3D graphics with exciting play modes, including First Blood, King of the Ring, and Tag Team. - Battle your way to the top of the N-Gage Arena leader boards.

software.name: X-Men Legends
software.Description: X-Men enter the realm of role-playing games with an intense story, superhero action, and multiplayer modes. The story in X-Men Legends begins when the X-Men learn that Magneto has devised a plan to give mutants the power to reign supreme over humans. To save the human race from imprisonment, you compose a four-person team from a roster of X-Men characters, including Storm, Gambit, and Wolverine. Complete each mission to strengthen your team, and unlock more characters, costumes, and treasures.

software.name: X-Men Legends II: Rise of Apocalypse
software.Description: In X-Men Legends II, the X-Men must join their enemy the Brotherhood to fight a greater menace--Apocalypse. The sequel to the team-based role-playing game X-Men Legends lets you play as one of many X-Men, and use and combine his or her unique abilities to defeat enemies. Rise of Apocalypse includes new mutant powers, playable characters, and environments. Also new to X-Men Legends II is online play, which lets you work cooperatively against other teams of mutants.

Release.name: X-Men Legends II: Rise of Apocalypse

ReleaseImages.Image: X-Men Legends II Rise of Apocalypse (EU)-67145_front.jpg

software.name: Xanadu Next
software.Description:
The PC-based RPG bestseller, XANADU, has traversed the boundaries of time and is making its newest appearance on the N-Gage game deck as XANADU NEXT!
The village chief's daughter, Momo, has been kidnapped and you have been asked to rescue her. Finding her will not be easy. You will have to battle hordes of demons and monsters, even challenging King-Dragon himself! Can you conquer the darkness hanging over the land and return the light of the gods to XANADU! You are the only one who can save this world. It's time to plunge into the darkness!

software.name: Xyanide
software.Description: Drake is a star fighter pilot escorting an execution craft that holds the evil witch Aguira. On route, an asteroid filled with Xyanide (a substance that materializes thoughts) hits the prisoner's ship. Now, as Drake, you must battle through a series of surreal nightmares. While piloting skills and kill efficiency are important to survive, you must also learn how to adapt to your different environments. Morph into different types of fighters, master new weapons, and acquire power-ups to defeat your enemies.
